column4: [TOP] vip3r, not necesarrily...I have a Broadcom based wireless card, and it wouldn't work by default because Ubunto couldn't provide the firmware for the card...
[TOP] vip3r, for Broadcom, there's an application that you can install that will extract the necesarry software from the WIndows drivers
there is also software for my cisco card
the cisco software wants me to install   libsigc++_1.0.4 and gtkmm_1.2.10
